Module Contents

bursty_dynamics.shared_function.remove_duplicate_events(df, subject_id, time_col)

Parameters: train_df (DataFrame): DataFrame containing train information. subject_id (str): Name of the column containing subject IDs. time_col (str): Name of the column containing timestamps.

Returns: DataFrame: DataFrame with duplicate events removed.

bursty_dynamics.shared_function.burstiness_parameter(events, find_interval_times)

Computes burstiness parameter using Kim and Jo (2016) formula

Parameters:

events -- a list of numeric timestamps

:return a real number

Kim, Eun-Kyeong, and Hang-Hyun Jo. ‘Measuring Burstiness for Finite Event Sequences’. Physical Review E 94, no. 3 (15 September 2016): 032311. https://doi.org/10.1103/PhysRevE.94.032311.

bursty_dynamics.shared_function.memory_coefficient(events, find_interval_times)

Computes memory coefficient using Goh and Barabási (2008) formula

Parameters:

events -- a list of numeric timestamps

:return a real number

Goh, K.-I., and A.-L. Barabási. ‘Burstiness and Memory in Complex Systems’. EPL (Europhysics Letters) 81, no. 4 (February 2008): 48002. https://doi.org/10.1209/0295-5075/81/48002.
